name: Refactory (itch)
description:
Controls:
Left Click - For all main actions
Right Click/Drag - Move camera
Spacebar - Return to starting camera position
Escape - Pause

How to Play:
Click on Factories to buy Trucks (5 Oil)
Use Laser (10 Ruby) to repel GigaLizard before he reaches shore
Blow up rocks (10 TNT) to create path for Shortcuts
Create Shortcuts to get supplies faster (60 Brick)
